pytest.command: uv run pytest tests/test_issue_4538_todo_copy.py tests/test_issue_2087_todo_repr.py tests/test_issue_2000_json_validation.py -v

ruff_check.command: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_4538_todo_copy.py

ruff_format.command: uv run ruff format --check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_4538_todo_copy.py
